channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best 3-in-1 Apple Charging Stations (2025)
item.description: Keep your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods topped up with these WIRED-tested docking systems.

item.title: Google adds its voice model Chirp 3 to its Vertex AI platform
item.description: Most of the focus in generative AI has been on text-based interfaces used to generate text, images and more. The next wave appears to be voice, and it...

item.title: Apple reportedly considered building the iPhone 17 Air without ports
item.description: After reporting in January that Apple is adding an “Air” option to its iPhone lineup, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman is offering more details about the upcom...

item.title: The 11 Best Amazon Echo and Alexa Speakers (2025): We've Tested Them All
item.description: We’ve rounded up our favorite speakers that let you talk to Alexa, from the best Echo speakers to third-party options like the Sonos Era.

item.title: The Best RAM for Your PC (2025)
item.description: Building a new computer or looking to upgrade your memory? Here are our favorite options right now.

item.title: UK’s internet watchdog puts storage and file-sharing services on watch over CSAM
item.description: As duties under the U.K.’s Online Safety Act (OSA) related to tackling illegal content came into force Monday, the internet watchdog, Ofcom, said it h...

item.title: How to Customize the Samsung Galaxy S25’s Best New Features
item.description: The Galaxy S25 flagships come with several clever new software tricks. Two of them—the Now Bar and the Now Brief—can be highly personalized.

item.title: These Laptop Stands Run My Household, and Life Is Better for It
item.description: Attention Apple users: Rain Design makes the best minimal, fuss-free stands for Macbooks, iMacs, iPads, and iPhones.

item.title: European tech industry coalition calls for ‘radical action’ on digital sovereignty — starting with buying local

item.title: Google beefs up its UK AI business with Agentspace data residency and more
